DOC.detailed_description: The study non-blinded , randomize control trial ass safety efficacy 24 week structure yoga exercise program ( YP ) versus blood pressure education walk program ( BPEP ) versus combine intervention reduce mild moderate high blood pressure adult pre-hypertension stage 1 hypertension . This do single center trial use parallel design . All potential subject screen first telephone 2 outpatient visit Clinical Translational Research Center ( CTRC ) hospital University Pennsylvania . Eligible subject make 3 visit CTRC admit overnight non-invasive 24-hour recording BP , well periodic blood , urine saliva collection . The entire study duration 28 week ( 24 week post-randomization ) include total 7 evaluation visit ( include 2 functional magnetic resonance image visit ) termination visit . Subjects randomize YP , BPEP combine intervention YP BPEP .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must willing able give write informed consent . Age > 18 year , < 75 year . BP criterion : Systolic Blood Pressure ( SBP ) > 130 , < 160 mm Hg . Willing comply studyrelated procedure . Subjects pregnant post partum < 3 month . Subjects currently take BP lower medication dietary supplement ( magnesium , potassium , calcium > 1200 mg/day , fish oil , ephedra , hawthorn , forskolin , etcâ€¦ ) . Stage II HTN ( SBP > 160 mmHg OR diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) > 100 mmHg ) . Nondominant arm circumference > 50 cm . BMI > 40.0 kg/m2 . Practicing yoga > 1x/month previous 6 month . Received/used experimental drug device within 30 day prior screen , donate blood > 1 pint within 8 week screen . Diabetes mellitis . Established cardiovascular disease . Known arrhythmias cardiac pacemaker . Current user ( within 30 day ) tobacco product . History renal insufficiency ( glomerular filtration rate < 60 ml/min ) . Women consume > 7 alcoholic drinks/week ; men consume > 14 drinks/week . Known autonomic neuropathy . Known secondary cause HTN ( renal artery stenosis , pheochromocytoma , coarctation aorta , hyperaldosteronism ) . Benzodiazepine , antipsychotic drug ( 3 month stable use SSRIs allow ) , steroid use . Known severe musculoskeletal problem spinal stenosis may limit participation yoga . Use mind/ body therapy Qi Gong , Tai Chi , meditation . Lack Internet access .
